title: Evolving Roles of Librarians in Online Education Environments and Design-Based Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Library Information Literacy and Digital Learning Tool Usage Experience
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing curation of online learning materials in science and metadata design.

learning_goals: Learners can describe at least three strategies for efficiently integrating science information resources in online learning environments.
Learners can apply the ADDIE instructional design framework to design micro-modules utilizing digital devices.
Design a customized online reference information service scenario for learners in the field of science

resources: Digital Content Platform for Science Education

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
